availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Tinker (U.S. Army lieutenant and adjutant)

body.p: U.S. Army lieutenant and adjutant. Served in the 1st Regiment Mississippi Marine Brigade (U.S.A.) as lieutenant and adjutant.

ab.bibl:
Indexes to the Carded Records of Soldiers Who Served in Volunteer Organizations During the Civil War, compiled 1899 - 1927, documenting the period 1861 - 1866, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M1290, Roll 0035.
Official Army Register of the Volunteer Force of the United States Army for the Years 1861, '62, '63, '64, '65: Missouri, Wisconsin, Iowa, Minnesota, California, Kansas, Oregon, Nevada, (United States: Adjutant General's Office, 1865), 139.
